Question: e-peas CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
e-peas

Product: AEM00920 & AEM10920 Energy Harvesting PMICs

- Optimized for Remote-Control Units (RCU) and Wireless Keyboard (KBD) design
- Supports maximizing energy transfer from Photovoltaic (PV) cells, storing energy in off-the-shelf storage elements, and delivering reliable power supply
- Up to 95% energy conversion efficiency
- AEM00920 optimized for PV cells with constant voltage regulation, AEM10920 optimized for PV cells with light dependent maximum power point
- Integrated 5V boost circuitry for quick charge boost function
- Integrated buck DC-DC converter for efficient energy conversion
- GPIO configuration for easy output voltage selection
- Ultra-low cold-start for operation in low light conditions
- New control and configuration features including shipping mode for storage element protection
- Available in 24-pin QFN package with 4x4sqmm board footprint
- AEM00920 available for sampling, AEM10920 available later in January 2024
Summary_cn:
e-peas

产品：AEM00920和AEM10920能量收集PMIC

- 为遥控器单元（RCU）和无线键盘（KBD）设计进行了优化
- 支持最大化从光伏（PV）电池转移能量，将能量储存到现成的储存元件中，并提供可靠的电源供应
- 最高95％的能量转换效率
- AEM00920针对具有恒定电压调节的光伏电池进行了优化，AEM10920针对具有光依赖最大功率点的光伏电池进行了优化
- 集成5V升压电路，用于快速充电增压功能
- 集成降压DC-DC转换器，实现高效能量转换
- GPIO配置，方便选择输出电压
- 超低的冷启动电压，可在低光照条件下操作
- 新的控制和配置功能，包括存储元件保护的出货模式
- 采用24引脚QFN封装，占用4×4平方毫米的板载面积
- AEM00920可供抽样测试，AEM10920将在2024年1月后提供
